attributes.action: Ban Motorway services charging fees to park
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ban Motorway services from charging to park. This should remain a free service for periods upto 11 hours. Drivers of all calibers need to rest charging them on motorways is wrong when driving legistation forces them to take rest breaks. Accident happen as drivers (mainly trucks)are unable to aford to park on a motorway services.
